member.name: M:KuttSharp.KuttApi.SubmitAsync(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Submit a link to be shortened
member.param: Original long URL to be shortened
Set a custom URL
Set a password
If a URL with the specified target exists returns it, otherwise will send a new shortened URL. Default is false.

member.name: M:KuttSharp.KuttApi.GetUrlsAsync
member.summary: Get the shortened URLs list

member.name: M:KuttSharp.KuttApi.DeleteAsync(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Delete a shortened URL
member.param: ID of the shortened URL
Required if a custom domain is used for short URL

member.name: M:KuttSharp.KuttApi.GetStatsAsync(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Get stats for a shortened URL
member.param: ID of the shortened URL
Required if a custom domain is used for short URL
